Plot: A group of sorority sisters try to cover up the death of their house-sister after a prank gone wrong, only to be stalked by a serial killer.
Title: Sorority Row
Writer: Josh Stolberg (screenplay), Pete Goldfinger (screenplay), Mark Rosman (screenplay)
Actors: Teri Andrez, Adam Barrie, Megan Wolfley, Robert Belushi
tomatoConsensus: Though it's slick and stylish, Sorority Row offers nothing new to the slasher genre and misses the mark both in its attempts at humor and thrills.
